Name: rolinherit
Description: role automatically inherits privileges of roles it is a member of

Name: rolcatupdate
Description: role may update system catalogs directly. (even a superuser may not do this unless this column is true.)

Name: rolcanlogin
Description: role may log in, that is, this role can be given as the initial session authorization identifier.

Name: rolconnlimit
Description: for roles that can log in, this sets maximum number of concurrent connections this role can make. -1 means no limit.

Name: rolvaliduntil
Description: password expiry time (only used for password authentication); null if no expiration

Name: rolconfig
Description: session defaults for run-time configuration variables
